statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT customer_email FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 101
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_email, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_email HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_count FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, total_amount AS sales_total FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_category, COUNT(*) AS number_of_products FROM products GROUP BY product_category ORDER BY number_of_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT category, product_name FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY category;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_date, product_id, total_sales FROM sales_report ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
